name: df-cf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ccf, cmpt(s0, con0, cint(cab(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(ccrd, cv(s2))), wa(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s2), wss(cv(s3), cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define the cofinality function. Definition B of Saharon Shelah, _Cardinal Arithmetic_ (1994), p. xxx (Roman numeral 30). See ~ cfval for its value and a description. (Contributed by NM, 1-Apr-2004.)
